title: Virginia Frederick
text:
Virginia Fiester Frederick (née Heise) (December 24, 1916 – May 30, 2010) was an American politician.
Born in <a href="Rock%20Island%2C%20Illinois">Rock Island, Illinois</a>. Frederick received her bachelor's degree from <a href="University%20of%20Iowa">University of Iowa</a>. She lived in <a href="Lake%20Forest%2C%20Illinois">Lake Forest, Illinois</a>. Frederick served in the <a href="Illinois%20House%20of%20Representatives">Illinois House of Representatives</a> from 1979 to 1995 and was a <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a>.
